oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Hoisting the Flag
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: sketches; Civil War; flags; post office; 1860s;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: "Hoisting the Stars and Stripes over the Post Office at Memphis, Tennessee." One of three illustrations on page 420 of the July 5, 1862 edition of Harper's Weekly.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Simplot, Alexander
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Illustrations from Harper's Weekly Newspaper and Frank Leslie's Illustrated Newspaper
